biotools.summary: Database for human genetic variants (GV) identified by genome-wide association studies. Contains twenty times more data than the NHGRI GWAS Catalog, manually curated from literature. Also has annotations for each GV.

bioschemas.name: GWASdb
bioschemas.summary: Database for human genetic variants (GV) identified by genome-wide association studies. Contains twenty times more data than the NHGRI GWAS Catalog, manually curated from literature. Also has annotations for each GV.
